Entries.default: A familiar energy, not unlike that you sensed from the Faces of the Hunt's artifacts, emanates from the figure's left ear.

You reach into the box, take hold of the puppet's left ear, and wrench it off with a loud crack that only barely masks the fortuneteller's cry of surprise.

The figure sits back in his box, blinking rapidly, one wooden hand going to the side of his head.

"The jerk returns? Go away, jerk!"

The wooden figure raises its chin.

"Salutations! Do you wish to hear your fortune?"

The puppet in the box cocks his head to the side and stares at you with a vacant expression.

He taps the metal coin slot expectantly.
"Salutations! Do you wish to hear your fortune? Only one pire."
Softly clicking, the wooden eyes blink at you.
"I don't suppose I was making much use of the thing. Still... you might've asked."
"I expected no better of you! Now go away before I... before I do something... you find unpleasant!"
